name: eighteen

A1 the number 18: You are allowed to vote at eighteen (= when you are 18 years old) The table was set for eighteen people.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was drafted into the army at eighteen.War was declared at eighteen hundred/18.00 hours .The product of six and three is eighteen.The couple eventually wed after an eighteen year engagement.Our house is number 18 - the one with the tree in the front garden.
